channel.title: How to make maintnance
channel.description: hey guys just wanted to ask when ur running ur server is there a way so that u can make it where the server is offline except for owners and admins? everyone else cant login but owners and admins can how do you do this? plz tell =p

item.title: How to make maintnance
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

[quote=".cLass, post:5, topic:410054"][quote author=gergy008 link=topic=511321.msg3710510#msg3710510 date=1313323595]

if your using delta just when they connect add a

if (playerRights < 2) {

}
if (playerRights > 1) {

}

[/quote]
That would make admins & owners unable to connect.[/quote]

OP?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make maintnance
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

Make a new client, make it connect to a different port, send it to the staff members, change your server so it hosts on that specific different port.

Read full topic
